time-series-prefix.description: Legacy Fabric prefix (ignored by S3 writer).

s3.description: Write Delta tables to Amazon S3

bucket.description: Name of the S3 bucket (no s3:// prefix).

prefix.description: Optional folder prefix inside the bucket (e.g. `replicas/`). Empty string or omit to write to root.

region.description: AWS region of the bucket, e.g. `us-east-1`.
